intro: Pinalia celebica, commonly known as the Celebes pinalia, is a flowering plant native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow in color. It has simple, opposite leaves that are usually ovate or elliptical in shape. Pinalia celebica is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
